name: Inside Out VR
description:
Inside out is a virtual reality game designed to make you move while you are locked-down at home. Just put on your VR device and enjoy a little exercise. We wanted to offer a  balanced physical experience in which power, speed, and agility are involved. 

Inside out helps you train your body, exercise your muscles, and pump up your cardio in a pleasant and enjoyable natural environment. 

Stay in shape and get ready for the amazing summer ahead of us ! Imagine your first day at the beach when everyone will be released of this current lockdown situation. With less than half an hour of Inside out every day, you'll definitely be the king of the coming outdoor exode !
